graphql.query:
mutation ($payload:CommonCreateCountryInput!)
{
	commonCreateCountry (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		iso3166Alpha2
		iso3166Alpha3
		iso3166Numeric
		customCode
		prefix
		image
		sort
		administrativeAreas
		latitude
		longitude
		zoom
		mapType
		langId
		name
		slug
		administrativeAreaLevel1
		administrativeAreaLevel2
		administrativeAreaLevel3
	}
}

graphql.query:
query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	commonGetCountries (query: $query)
	{
		id
		iso3166Alpha2
		iso3166Alpha3
		iso3166Numeric
		customCode
		prefix
		image
		sort
		administrativeAreas
		latitude
		longitude
		zoom
		mapType
		availableLangs
		createdAt
		updatedAt
		id
		name
		slug
		administrativeAreaLevel1
		administrativeAreaLevel2
		administrativeAreaLevel3
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	commonFindCountry (query: $query)
	{
		id
		iso3166Alpha2
		iso3166Alpha3
		iso3166Numeric
		customCode
		prefix
		image
		sort
		administrativeAreas
		latitude
		longitude
		zoom
		mapType
		availableLangs
		createdAt
		updatedAt
		id
		name
		slug
		administrativeAreaLevel1
		administrativeAreaLevel2
		administrativeAreaLevel3
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

{
	commonFindCountryById (id:$id)

}

}
